tool_description: Get the basic specifications on all types of commercial airplanes.

api_list.name: Airplanes ordered by descending
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all airplanes ordered by name in descending order.

required_parameters.name: ordering
required_parameters.description: Specifies the order of the airplane names.

api_list.name: Airplanes ordered by ascending
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all airplanes ordered by name in ascending order.

required_parameters.name: ordering
required_parameters.description: Specifies the order of the airplane names.

api_list.name: Search by Engine
api_list.description: Get all airplanes that contain the specified engine keyword.

required_parameters.name: engine__icontains
required_parameters.description: Keyword to search for in the engine type.

api_list.name: Airplanes by Brand
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all airplanes by specified brands such as Boeing, Airbus, etc.

required_parameters.name: brand
required_parameters.description: The brand of the airplane to filter by.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for an airplane by its name.

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: The name of the airplane to search for.

api_list.name: Single Airplane
api_list.description: Get details of a single airplane by its ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier of the airplane.

api_list.name: All Airplanes
api_list.description: Retrieve complete data of all airplanes available in the database.
